Search Search Search ﻿ Bengt J. Nilsson Professor bengt.nilsson.ts@mau.se +46 40 665 72 44 orcid.org/0000-0002-1342-8618 Employed at Faculty of Technology and Society Department of Computer Science and Media Technology Research subject Computer Sciences Pedagogy Mathematics Algorithmics Computational Geometry Presentation PhD in Computer Science. Research interests in algorithm theory specifically concerning geometric and combinatorial computational problems closely associated to the "travelling salesman problem". In addition, works on optimization of search and recommendations in web-based systems.
